entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
